description.body: Unlock infinite comps with our new set: Lore & Legends!

description.body: Choncc’s Treasure returns with our final patch of the set before Lore & Legends goes live on December 3rd with patch 16.1!

description.body: A light balance patch for our Tactician’s Crown competitors and a larger one for Uncharted Realms.

description.body: A smaller balance patch for K.O. Coliseum and a Dragon-sized entrance for our Uncharted Realms revival!

description.body: New 2XKO has entered the K.O. Coliseum with cross-over Power-Ups to help you fight your way to the top of the lobby or Ao Shin’s Ascent which is only live for one more patch!

description.body: Small in balance, but big in Power Up improvements; Patch 15.5 has entered the ring.

description.body: Welcome back to another episode of K.O. Coliseum! We got balance changes to units, items, and some of our Prismatic traits to make them easier to hit!

category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: It’s our first patch of K.O. Coliseum and we’re calling em’ as we see-um with a ton of balance changes and a few new Opening Encounters!

description.body: Competitive changes for Cyber City, Double Up updates, Pengu’s Party & Revival changes, and more!

description.body: 14.6 marks TFT’s sixth year anniversary, the return of Pengu’s Party, and a whole lotta buffs!

description.body: 14.5 brings an item overhaul to rework and upgrade core items and add four new Artifacts. It’s also got balance changes for Cyber City and Revival: Remix Rumble alike!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Balance and RNGolem, 14.4 is Cyber City’s return to the natural order of things.

description.body: Patch 14.3 brings new Hacks, Opening Encounters, balance changes, and a rework for Kobuko.

description.body: Hack your way into 14.2 with Trait changes, Augment changes, and more options in Double Up Gift Armories.

description.body: Welcome to our next set: Cyber City, where the streets are up for grabs as you roll, explode, and hack your way to control!

description.body: Patch 13.8 is the last patch of Into the Arcane, I guess you could call it, Out of the Arcane, and we’re leaving it with a bang in the form of a second Anomaly round and a buff-load of buffs!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Patch 13.7 is our Tactician's Crown patch, so we're sticking to exclusively small buffs for just a few of the champs, traits, and Augments that need it most. But there's also something else in 13.7...

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Patch 13.6 is all about buffing the traits and champs that haven’t been able to get enough screen time this set or in the show the set’s based on (this was just a coincidence though).

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Patch 13.5 brings changes to Opening Encounter frequency, the removal of Chem-Baron Emblems (and with it a small rejiggering of the trait), and a few balance changes to round things out.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: It’s the Year of the Snake on the Convergence, and we’re celebrating with new Chibis, a new event Pass (and Act II Pass), Dark Cosmic Jhin Unbound, and the Festival of Beasts Revival! We also have a few changes for live including several new Anomalies!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: We’re back with our first (small) patch of the year.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Into the Arcane is evolving with patch 14.24, which introduces new Anomalies, new Opening Encounters, new Augments, and three ultra-powerful 6-costs.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Go Into the Arcane with TFT's newest set that brings characters from the show into the Convergence.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: 14.22 brings HUGE updates to Team Planner, including Team Codes, Multi-team, and more. It’s also our last patch of the set so be sure to hit your Ranked goals and try out Choncc’s Treasure which returns this patch only!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: 14.21 is our Tactician’s Crown patch, and we’re focused on balance for our most competitive play and buffs for things that haven’t been working out. It’s also the last patch of the Dawn of Heroes Revival, so good luck on your climb to Sage!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: 14.20 is full of buffs for champions low on magic and nerfs for our mayhem-causing Augments!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: 14.19 brings the Dawn of Heroes Revival to a queue near you! But that’s not all, we’ve got changes for live to lessen the sting of Honeymancy, sweeten Sugarcraft, and make the Eldritch Summon a thing to be feared.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: With 14.17 we’re buffing what’s been low on magic while lowering the impact of our core items.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: It's our first patch for Magic n' Mayhem, and we're doing a large balance pass to ensure all magical comps (and mayhem) can prosper. But balance changes aren’t the only thing arriving with 14.16. Chibi Blitzcrank, Chibi Space Groove Blitzcrank, and Wise Old Dango enter the Convergence!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: Let loose with our new set, Magic n’ Mayhem, which brings an all-new mechanic, Charms, to sling alongside a magically inclined roster, wild new Augments, and traits representative of magics from across the Magitorium!

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: It’s our last patch of Inkborn Fables before our next set, Magic n’ Mayhem, takes off, so we’ve packed a patch full of surprises that are sure to create some novel comps and wild builds.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: It’s the Tactician’s Crown patch, so we’ve got small adjustments for live and Pengu’s Party.

category.title: Game Updates
category.description: The definitive source on all updates coming to the game.

description.body: TFT’s 5-Year Bash brings a free event pass, login rewards, and a new Game Mode, Pengu’s Party! On the live side, we’re shipping a patch (mostly) full of buffs, a revert of our Level 7 odds change, and more!

category.title: Game Updates
